statements: UPDATE maintenance_records SET service_cost = 250.00, description = 'Routine inspection' WHERE record_id = 1;
UPDATE maintenance_records SET description = 'Replaced propeller', service_cost = 150.00 WHERE drone_id = 3;
UPDATE maintenance_records SET service_cost = 1500.00, technician_name = 'John Doe' WHERE record_id = 10;
UPDATE maintenance_records SET description = 'Replaced broken parts', maintenance_date = '2021-07-15' WHERE drone_id = 5;
UPDATE maintenance_records SET maintenance_cost = 750.50 WHERE record_id = 101;
UPDATE drones SET battery_level = 85.75, total_flights = 1500 WHERE drone_id = 201;
UPDATE maintenance_records SET maintenance_cost = 1200.50, maintenance_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE record_id = 101 AND drone_id = 201
UPDATE drones SET battery_level = 78.35, total_flights = total_flights + 5 WHERE drone_id = 301
UPDATE DroneMaintenanceRecord SET maintenance_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE record_id = 1;
UPDATE Technician SET specialty = 'Drones Repair' WHERE technician_id = 3;
UPDATE Drone SET status = 'In Service', last_serviced = '2022-09-15' WHERE drone_id = 101;
UPDATE DroneMaintenanceRecord SET description = 'Replaced motor, updated firmware', technician_id = 201 WHERE record_id = 501;
UPDATE maintenance_records SET servicing_personnel = 'John Doe' WHERE record_id = 101;
UPDATE drone_details SET warranty_expiry_date = '2023-06-30' WHERE drone_id = 201;
UPDATE maintenance_records SET servicing_personnel='John Doe', maintenance_date='2023-06-15' WHERE record_id = 101;
UPDATE drone_details SET warranty_expiry_date='2025-12-31', model='Advanced Model X' WHERE drone_id = 201;
UPDATE drones SET drone_name = 'New Drone Name' WHERE drone_id = 1;
UPDATE maintenance_records SET maintenance_type = 'Routine Check' WHERE drone_id = 2;
UPDATE drones SET last_service_date = '2022-08-15', service_due_date = '2022-11-15' WHERE drone_id = 1;
UPDATE technicians SET technician_specialty = 'Drone Repair Specialist' WHERE technician_id = 3;
